title: How to Convert Mac .Pages Format Into Jpeg

steps.title: In Pages, Drop down the File menu and select Print (Command-P).
steps.content: In Pages, Drop down the File menu and select Print (Command-P).

steps.title: Press the PDF Drop-down in the bottom left corner of the Print window.
steps.content: Press the PDF Drop-down in the bottom left corner of the Print window.

steps.title: Select the "Save PDF to iPhoto" Button.
steps.content: Select the "Save PDF to iPhoto" Button.

steps.title: Now an iPhoto window will open with your image in a new folder.
steps.content: Now an iPhoto window will open with your image in a new folder. iPhoto automatically converts the PDF to a jpeg.

steps.title: Drag and drop the image into the folder of your choice in the Finder window.
steps.content: Drag and drop the image into the folder of your choice in the Finder window.
